info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 10:29PM CDT until April 15 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR WINNEBAGO AND BOONE COUNTIES... At 1028 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pecatonica to Roscoe to 6 miles south of Capron, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rockford, Belvidere, Loves Park, Machesney Park, Roscoe, South Beloit, Rockton, Poplar Grove, Candlewick Lake, Cherry Valley, Pecatonica, Durand, Capron, Timberlane, Garden Prairie, Caledonia, Shirland, Lake Summerset and Harrison. This includes... Boone County Fairgrounds, Rock Cut State Park, Rock Valley College, Rockford Rivets Baseball, Rockford Speedway, and Winnebago County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstate... I-90 between mile markers 1 and 17, and between mile markers 22 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
